page.title: 12Housing
page.content: Jeremy's House. My house is brick external with tiled panels and a tiled roof.It is fully double glazed by the firms Everest and Alpine,in alloy frame set in hardwood surrounds.The front and rear doors are matching and there are sliding patio doors.We have a tarmacadem drive and the house is surrounded by concrete pathways.The garden is landscaped with trees and shrubs and the boundary has thorn everegreen hedging.It has an intergral garage and garden shed. Debra's Flat. I live in a large flat above the Lion Cafe,which my parents own.The house is made of bricks and wooden beams.We have 3 large bedrooms,2 hall and a very large lounge.We have built a stairway from the yard to get to the flat.There are 8 rooms altogether.The restraunt seats 60 people.
